description: Unified Comprehensive README and Threshold Guide for Master Audit Log

identity.Processing_Date: Timestamp of the last pipeline execution.

OptiTrack_Error_mm.description: Mean 3D residual error from camera calibration during capture.
OptiTrack_Error_mm.impact: Fundamental precision of the capture volume. Higher error increases spatial uncertainty.

Butterworth_Filter.description: Low-pass filter used to remove high-frequency noise while preserving human movement.
Butterworth_Filter.cutoff_hz_threshold: Typically 6-12 Hz for dynamic tasks. Your value: 10.0 Hz.
Butterworth_Filter.order: Typically 4th order (Dual-pass for zero phase lag).
Butterworth_Filter.scientific_note: A cutoff too low (e.g., < 4Hz) will 'oversmooth' and lose peak velocities.

Savitzky_Golay_Filter.description: Polynomial filter used for robust derivation of velocity and acceleration.
Savitzky_Golay_Filter.scientific_note: Preserves higher-order moments (peaks) better than Butterworth, essential for acceleration.

data_integrity.Total_Frames: Total frame count in the recording.

Missing_Raw_percent.description: Percentage of missing marker data before interpolation.
Missing_Raw_percent.impact: Extensive gaps require interpolation which introduces estimation bias.

Max_Gap_MS.description: Longest continuous gap in data converted to milliseconds.
Max_Gap_MS.impact: Biological movement cannot be accurately guessed beyond this duration.

Bone_Stability_CV.description: Coefficient of Variation (StdDev/Mean) of bone lengths during motion (L-CV).
Bone_Stability_CV.impact: Primary metric for validating the 'Rigid Body' assumption and marker skin-sliding artifact.

Skeletal_Alerts.description: Count of frames where bone length deviation exceeded 3 standard deviations.
Skeletal_Alerts.threshold: 0 alerts is ideal; > 5% of frames indicates consistent skeletal failure.

Ref_Stability_mm.description: Standard deviation of marker position during the static reference pose.
Ref_Stability_mm.impact: High instability here affects all subsequent coordinate system transformations.

Signal_Noise_RMS.description: Root Mean Square of residuals (Raw minus Filtered data). Measures noise magnitude.

Outlier_Frames.description: Count of frames exceeding physiological limits (e.g., > 1500 deg/s).
Outlier_Frames.impact: Digital spikes that may skew maximum acceleration values.

Max_Ang_Vel.description: Peak angular velocity measured in degrees per second.
Max_Ang_Vel.physiological_ceiling: Varies by joint; Spine/Hips typically < 800-1200 deg/s in athletic dance.

Quality_Score.calculation: Penalty-based (Deductions for Missing Data, Bone CV, and Skeletal Alerts).

Research_Decision.ACCEPT: Score >= 75 AND Ref_Status = PASS. Reliable for publication.
Research_Decision.REVIEW: Score 50-75. Potential noise, requires visual inspection of the signal.
Research_Decision.REJECT: Score < 50 OR Skeletal Failure. Not suitable for kinematic analysis.
